ygData.subject: Re: Frigid Callings
ygData.msgSnippet: Nightshift raises his paw.  I ll go, if anyone s good at climbing its a cat, and now I m a cat.  I promise I ll be careful, and I will land on my feet.

Content-Type: text/plain;

Nightshift raises his paw.

" I'll go, if anyone's good at climbing its a c=
at, and now I'm a cat.  I promise I'll be careful, and I will land on my fe=
et.  Besides better me than you guys."

Don't be envious of what you don't =
have, be grateful for things you already posses.  Nothing is worth more tha=
n family and friends.

On Jan 4, 2012, at 3:23 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyc=
lonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Nightshift sits back in shock.
>=
 >
> > " Slag, Cheetor. Sure explains quite a bit doesn't it?"
> 
> <NEW>
>=
 
> "Now what?" WOLDFGANG said.
> 
> PROWL looked at the screen, "Well if w=
e can reset the Satellite
> somehow then perhaps we can get it to accept ou=
r commands again."
> 
> There was a grunt from WOLFGANG, "I told you, we're=
 going to have to
> go up there!"
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> - Preston
> 

--Apple-Mail-16A5BC58-6A2C-496C-B7C6-DABD027C247C

w what?" WOLDFGANG said.<br>
